mapper.sql: id, name, passwd, salt, bankcard, alipay, phone, email, qq, systempasswd, status, mktime, lastlogintime, remark, company
mapper.insert: insert into memberbusiness (id, name, passwd, salt, bankcard, alipay, phone, email, qq, systempasswd, status, mktime, lastlogintime, remark, company) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwd,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{bankcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alipay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{systempasswd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{mktime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastlogintime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=TINYINT})

mapper.update:
update memberbusiness
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
passwd = #{passwd,jdbcType=CHAR},
salt = #{salt,jdbcType=CHAR},
bankcard = #{bankcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alipay = #{alipay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=CHAR},
qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
systempasswd = #{systempasswd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
mktime = #{mktime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lastlogintime = #{lastlogintime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company = #{company,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update memberbusiness set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, passwd = #{passwd,jdbcType=CHAR}, salt = #{salt,jdbcType=CHAR}, bankcard = #{bankcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alipay = #{alipay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=CHAR}, qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, systempasswd = #{systempasswd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, mktime = #{mktime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lastlogintime = #{lastlogintime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company = #{company,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT id,`name`,phone, (SELECT cname FROM app_company WHERE cid=a.company) cname from memberbusiness a WHERE a.company in(select cid from app_company) ORDER BY a.id
SELECT from memberbusiness order by id

SELECT
FROM memberbusiness WHERE phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 0,1

SELECT
FROM memberbusiness WHERE phone = #{phoneOrMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or email = #{phoneOrMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 0,1

SELECT
FROM memberbusiness WHERE email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 0,1
